#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test,len,k,i;
    char str[50];
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        cin>>str;
        len=strlen(str);
        k=len>>1;
        for(i=k-1;i>=0;i--)
            cout<<str[i];
        for(i=len-1;i>=k;i--)
            cout<<str[i];
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
